short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you a Salesforce Solution Engineer and ChatGPT user? Fed up of typing out your prompt over and over again? Look no further...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Salesforce SE's using Chat GPT!

Once the extension is clicked, a prompt is copied to your clipboard. Click Ctrl+V (Windows) or Cmd+V (Mac) to paste the prompt into your ChatGPT session before writing your question. This saves time and makes your conversation more contextual.
